item.title: Jpeg decoder to PPM | Ensimag's Project
item.author: Author
item.description: The project This project is about building from scratch a functional JPEG to PPM decoder. I teamed up with 2 other students to build the decoder using C. How it works JPEG format compress images using mathematical methods and algorithms that are described on the official JPEG documentation. process of encoding and decoding Huffman coding: The output from Huffman’s algorithm can be viewed as a variable-length code table for encoding a source symbol.

item.title: Size of Connex Components in unoriented 2D graph | Ensimag's Project
item.author: Author
item.description: The project Considering a set of points $p_i$, $1 \le i \le n$, and a limit distance $s$, we want to know the number a connex component of the given set of points and distance. Two vertices $p_i$ and $p_j$ are linked by an edge if $d(p_i, p_j) \le s$. A connex component is a sub-graph where all the vertices are linked by transitivity. A solution I worked in pair with Hugo on different methods.
